title: Circuits operating at different voltages
fullText:
Protection shall be provided against injury or property damage because of any harmful effects of a fault between live parts of circuits supplied at different voltages.
Protection may be provided by:
• (a) segregation; or
NOTE: Clause 3.9.8.1 provides guidance on the segregation of circuits of different voltage levels.
• (b) installation of devices for protection against overvoltages.
NOTE: Clause 2.7 provides guidance on the installation of devices for protection against overvoltages.
